comment.body:
Cannot access my iOS atm, but please try this rule:

`@@||lecker.de^$generichide`

This rule is in Base filter which fixes it on other devices.

`#$#.pub_728x90.text-ad.textAd.text_ad.text_ads.text-ads.text-ad-links { display: block !important; }`

Advanced Protection is enabled?

comment.body:
Puste miejsce po reklamie i link do udostępniania naprawione (aktualizacja filtrów powinna być dostępna za około 1-2 godziny).
Jeśli chodzi o newsletter, to blokuje go lista `Polish Annoyances Filters` i zgaduję, że robi to celowo.
Dodanie tej reguły:
```
@@||forms.freshmail.io/*/index.html$domain=newsweek.pl
```
do reguł użytkownika powinno odblokować newsletter.

https://github.com/Rfgtkm @Rfgtkm

commits.message:
biz.heraldcorp.com - Tracker TrackParameter (#122979)

* biz.heraldcorp.com - Tracker

* biz.heraldcorp.com - TrackParameter

* Add GitHub PR URL

* Fix typo error

Co-authored-by: zloyden <33488229+zloyden@users.noreply.github.com>

pull_request.title: biz.heraldcorp.com - Tracker TrackParameter
pull_request.body:
# Prerequisites

## To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

# What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [X] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

# What issue is being fixed?

## Enter the issue address

 - https://biz.heraldcorp.com/view.php?ud=20220628000127
 - https://n.news.naver.com/mnews/ranking/article/016/0002008795?ntype=RANKING&sid=001

## Add your comment and screenshots

### How to reproduce a tracker parameter

1. Visit [here](https://n.news.naver.com/mnews/ranking/article/016/0002008795?ntype=RANKING&sid=001).
2. Click one of the highlighted elements:

      <details>
      <summary>Screenshot</summary>
      
      ![Screens2323](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/98787049/176238789-a8bd0003-3490-4552-b957-7a1b796846ab.png)
      
      </details>


### Similarweb web traffic report

 - https://www.similarweb.com/website/heraldcorp.com/#traffic


## Terms

- [X] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

## To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

# What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [X] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

# What issue is being fixed?

## Enter the issue address

 - https://biz.heraldcorp.com/view.php?ud=20220628000127
 - https://n.news.naver.com/mnews/ranking/article/016/0002008795?ntype=RANKING&sid=001

## Add your comment and screenshots

### How to reproduce a tracker parameter

1. Visit [here](https://n.news.naver.com/mnews/ranking/article/016/0002008795?ntype=RANKING&sid=001).
2. Click one of the highlighted elements:

      <details>
      <summary>Screenshot</summary>
      
      ![Screens2323](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/98787049/176238789-a8bd0003-3490-4552-b957-7a1b796846ab.png)
      
      </details>


### Similarweb web traffic report

 - https://www.similarweb.com/website/heraldcorp.com/#traffic


## Terms

- [X] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
Jak rozumiem, problem powodują niestandardowe filtry.
Usuń je proszę i spróbuj włączyć te same filtry w ustawieniach AdGuarda (`Ustawienia -> Filtry - Specyficzne językowe`).
Dodatkowo włącz jeszcze `Oficjalne polskie filtry dla AdBlock, uBlock Origin i AdGuard`.
Tak jak na obrazkach poniżej.

<details><summary>Obrazki</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/176367187-9616cc89-9729-4e51-9077-2e557f2b1e00.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/176368042-f1ba29f8-aa9d-4d4e-8df8-38a127a5552c.png)

</details>

Potem zaktualizuj filtry, a następnie sprawdź proszę ponownie, czy problem nadal występuje.

comment.body:
Naprawione, aktualizacja filtrów powinna być dostępna za około 1-2 godziny.
Prawdopodobnie wymagane będzie również wyczyszczenie pamięci podręcznej strony.
